widget.title: Label
widget.p: The following label displays a short text string and an image. Its content is centered both vertically and horizontally.

parameters.parameter: The text string that the label displays.
The icon image that the label displays.

The alignment of the label's content along the X axis, vertically is centered. Possible values are: left, center, and right. The default value, if not set, is left. The image position horizontally left, above, and right relative to the text.
Specifies the underlined char in the label's text.
name, enabled, visible, tooltip, property, width, height, colspan, rowspan, weightx, weighty, halign, and valign parameters are similar to component
